mapper.sql: select product_idx as productIdx, product_name as productName, content as content, img1 as img1, img2 as img2, img3 as img3, views as views, price as price, cnt as cnt, detail_img as detailImg from product
mapper.select: select pr.user_id, pr.score, pr.regdate, pr.product_idx, pr.review_idx, pr.content from product_reviews pr left outer join kakao_table kt on kt.kakao_number = pr.kakao_number inner join users u on u.memberid = pr.user_id inner join product p on p.product_idx = pr.product_idx where pr.product_idx = #{productIdx}
